job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Required Technical Skills:Strong SRE experience along with automated build tools, continuous integration and continuous deployment concepts.Experienced in Agile development lifecycleHands-on experience with the following:Programming languages: Python, ShellDatabase platforms: DB2/MSSQLSCM tools: GITContinuous integration Tools: JenkinsWeb servers: Tomcat/ApacheOperating systems: UnixGood knowledge of:Programming languages: Perl, batchDatabase platforms: PostgreSQLCloud-based environments such as: AWS and AzureContainer platform: DockerOperating systems: WindowsDesired Technical Skills:Monitoring tools like AppDynamics, Splunk and PrometheusBuild automation tools: Ant, Gradle, MavenRequired AptitudesAbility to add value by bringing new ideas to the team and taking the initiative in improving the existing processes.Ability to take new requirements from the application teams to bring back to the core team build additional tools and automation.Passion for innovating and using technology to find creative solutions to optimize systems.Eager to learn and be in sync with what is happening in technology, DevOps/SRE, both in and outside the firm.Educational qualification and experience:Bachelor's degree in engineering/computer science or MCA from recognized institutionMinimum 5 years of relevant experience.Language requirements: Must be able to work in an English-speaking environmentPowered by JazzHRCTC0hhUZUw
